meanings.definition: The act of dropping something outside.
meanings.sent1: I saw the outdropping of the leaf from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The outdropping of rain made the ground wet.
meanings.sent3: The outdropping of the acorn startled the squirrel.
meanings.sent4: Her outdropping of secrets surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The outdropping of the rock echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: A drop of liquid falling outside.
meanings.sent1: The outdropping of the rain created puddles on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: I felt the outdropping of the water from the leaky faucet.
meanings.sent3: The outdropping of the juice stained the tablecloth.
meanings.sent4: Her tears were an outdropping of her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The outdropping of the waterfall was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: She likes to outdrop seeds in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally outdropped my keys while walking.
meanings.sent3: He outdropped the ball and it rolled away.
meanings.sent4: The magician outdropped the coin into his pocket.
meanings.sent5: Please don't outdrop trash on the street.
